name: Magic Potion VR (leey921, jasminleung177, yaogeezi, Zhenyu (Dean) Yang)
name_original: Magic Potion VR (leey921, jasminleung177, yaogeezi, Zhenyu (Dean) Yang)
description:
Magic Potion

You’re a cursed magician and you need to escape from the dungeon. You need to make a magical potion that will activate the portal to escape by adding all the ingredients and mix them in the right order.

Developers:

Jasmin Liang

Dean Yang

Yeonseo Lee

Yii Liu
